thread.title: Drone footage captures great white shark stalking unsuspecting surfers
thread.title_full: Drone footage captures great white shark stalking unsuspecting surfers

author: Han Nguyen
title: Drone footage captures great white shark stalking unsuspecting surfers
text:
Drone footage captures great white shark stalking unsuspecting surfers Han Nguyen twitter TWEET More 
A NSW Government drone has captured the moment a great white shark stalks unsuspecting surfers at Lighthouse Beach, Ballina, in the state's north. 
The footage was shot by the NSW Department of Primary Industry over summer as part of the government's $16 million shark management strategy. The Bondi to Manly walk Play Video NSW Government's $16m shark strategy NSW Government's $16m shark strategy 
Shark detecting drones are being trialled on beaches in NSW to combat shark attacks along the state's coast. Vision courtesy NSW DPI. Up Next The Bondi to Manly walk Play Video The Bondi to Manly walk The Bondi to Manly walk 
John Faulkner, former defence minister; Di Westaway, founder of Coastrek; and Lachlan Harris, co-founder/CEO of One Big Switch, are looking to establish the Bondi to Manly harbour walk. Up Next Dashcam video: police officer found not guilty of assault Play Video Dashcam video: police officer found not ... Dashcam video: police officer found not guilty of assault 
Dashcam video shows a police officer kicking, punching and stomping on a man after he was involved in a high-speed crash during a pursuit through Hamilton in January 2016. Vision first appeared on the the Newcastle Herald . Up Next The resurfaced Gordon Wood interview Play Video The resurfaced Gordon Wood interview The resurfaced Gordon Wood interview 
Almost 20 years after it first aired, a court has been shown a television interview in which Gordon Wood asks Paul Barry, 'So, do you think I did it?'. Vision: Seven Network Up Next Plane crash at Bankstown airport Play Video Plane crash at Bankstown airport Plane crash at Bankstown airport 
Fire crews are on scene as an ex-military jet has made a crash landing on a runway at Bankstown Airport. Vision: Seven News Up Next Katoomba RSL gutted by fire Play Video Katoomba RSL gutted by fire Katoomba RSL gutted by fire 
A popular RSL club in the Blue Mountains has been gutted by fire on Friday afternoon. Vision: Seven News. Up Next Woman struck by car in Chatswood Play Video Woman struck by car in Chatswood Woman struck by car in Chatswood 
Police continue to make inquiries after a woman was hit by a car on Sydney's North Shore on Friday morning. More videos NSW Government's $16m shark strategy 
Shark detecting drones are being trialled on beaches in NSW to combat shark attacks along the state's coast. Vision courtesy NSW DPI. 
It shows a great white swimming in open water before moving closer to two surfers who are unaware of the predator. 
One surfer catches a wave and speeds away from the shark. The shark then moves its attention to the second surfer, who is dangling his legs in the water before suddenly swimming away. SHARE
